attributes.action: Create a "Water Supply Grid" to transport water from areas of plenty to those with less.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The above to reduce the possibility of the failure of one water treatment plant, such as  Mythe in Tewksbury, from disadvantaging so many people. Terrorists only have to see the economic losses and social unrest caused in the area served by the Mythe plant to realise the value of these plants as suitable targets.
